TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProfileSubtypeManager extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Creates, deletes, retrieves, and manages profile subtypes for a profile type.

remarks.para: The following sample demonstrates how to use the ProfileSubtypeManager to create both a user profile and an organization profile .
